speaker: Narrator
text: It's late. Most of the inn has gone to sleep. You find Kara outside, looking up at the stars.

speaker: Protagonist
text: Too much on my mind. You?

speaker: Kara
text: Same. I keep thinking about how different things are now. Three years ago, I was alone, running for my life every day.

speaker: Kara
text: Now I'm here. With you. Fighting back instead of running. It's... strange. But good.

speaker: Kara
text: ...Yeah? Because sometimes I wonder if you realize how much you mean to people. To me.

speaker: Narrator
text: She moves closer. You can feel the warmth radiating from her.

speaker: Kara
text: You saved my life that day. And every day since, you make me want to be stronger. Better.

speaker: Kara
text: That's not something I take lightly.

speaker: Narrator
text: The moment hangs between you. Charged. Meaningful.
